name: playwright-framework
description: Playwright JavaScript Test Automation Framework with multi-country/multi-language support

scripts.test:germany: npm run clean:allure && cross-env COUNTRY=germany playwright test
scripts.test:france: npm run clean:allure && cross-env COUNTRY=france playwright test
scripts.test:usa: npm run clean:allure && cross-env COUNTRY=usa playwright test
scripts.test:amazon-search:chrome: npm run clean:allure && playwright test tests/amazon-search.spec.js --project=chromium-desktop
scripts.test:amazon-search:chrome:report: npm run test:amazon-search:chrome && npm run report
scripts.report: npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
